data.comment: The big names in today's match at Arena Fonte Nova have now been confirmed.
Today's referee, Rafael Traci, has blown to start the match.
In the minute 1, Rafael Traci awards the away team a throw-in.
In Salvador a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Bahia.
In the minute 3, Ramires (Bahia) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Can Bahia capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Can Bahia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Recife PE's half?
In the minute 5, Bahia have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
Bahia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 7, Ramires of Bahia is pulled up for offside.
Throw-in high up the field for Recife PE in Salvador.
Throw-in for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
In the minute 8, Free kick Recife PE.
Recife PE surge into the attack at Arena Fonte Nova but Marcao Silva’s header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Salvador.
In the minute 9, Ball safe as Recife PE is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rafael Traci awards Bahia a goal kick.
Throw-in for Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 11, Free kick for Bahia in the half of Recife PE.
Rafael Traci signals a throw-in for Recife PE, close to Bahia's area.
Throw-in for Bahia close to the penalty box.
In the minute 15, Throw-in Recife PE.
Gilberto of Bahia gets in a strike, but is off target.
Recife PE have a goal kick.
In the minute 16, Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
Corner awarded to Bahia.
Gilberto (Bahia) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 17, Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
Throw-in Bahia.
Bahia push upfield and Gilberto gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Recife PE defence.
In the minute 19, Ball safe as Bahia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
In the minute 22, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
Hernane Brocador is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 25, Recife PE’s Hernane Brocador is on his feet again at Arena Fonte Nova.
Recife PE to take a throw-in in Bahia territory.
Bahia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 26, Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Recife PE.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Bahia.
In the minute 28, Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Rafael Traci awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Recife PE in the half of Bahia.
In the minute 31, Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
Bahia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 32, Rafael Traci awards the away team a throw-in.
Rafael Traci signals a Recife PE throw-in in Bahia's half.
Recife PE's Thiago Neves gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 33, Goal kick for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
Throw-in for Bahia in the half of Recife PE.
Bahia have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 37, In Salvador, Gilberto (Bahia) misses the target with a header.
Recife PE have a goal kick.
Can Recife PE capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bahia's half?
In the minute 39, An attacking Recife PE player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Hernane Brocador nets and Recife PE now lead 0-1. The goal came from the penalty spot.
Ball safe as Recife PE is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 43, Throw-in Recife PE.
Throw-in for Recife PE in the half of Bahia.
Throw-in for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Bahia in their own half.
Rafael Traci will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Throw-in for Recife PE at Arena Fonte Nova.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
In Salvador Bahia attack through Ramires. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 45, Rafael Traci signals a Recife PE throw-in in Bahia's half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Claudio Prates is making the team's first substitution at Arena Fonte Nova with Clayson replacing Marco Antonio.
Claudio Prates (Bahia) is making a second substitution, with Daniel replacing Ramires.
Recife PE needs to be cautious. Bahia have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 47, Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
Recife PE awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Bahia.
In the minute 49, Bahia's Clayson has run offside.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
In Salvador a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 53, Can Recife PE get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bahia's half?
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Recife PE just outside Bahia's area.
Marcao Silva (Recife PE) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Goal! Marcao Silva extends Recife PE's lead to 0-2 in Salvador with a header.
In the minute 54, Thiago Neves instrumental with a fine assist.
In Salvador Bahia drive forward through Gregore. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 56, Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
The home team have replaced Elber with Fessin. This is the third substitution made today by Claudio Prates.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Bahia.
In the minute 58, Leandro Barcia is on a sub for Hernane Brocador for Recife PE.
In the minute 59, Free kick for Bahia in the half of Recife PE.
Marquinhos is booked for the away team.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
In the minute 62, Bahia to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Bahia's Fessin gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Recife PE defender.
In the minute 67, Corner awarded to Bahia.
Rafael Traci signals a throw-in for Bahia, close to Recife PE's area.
In the minute 70, Ball safe as Recife PE is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Recife PE make their second substitution with Luciano replacing Marquinhos.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
Recife PE will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Bahia.
In the minute 72, Gilberto for Bahia drives towards goal at Arena Fonte Nova. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
Clayson (Bahia) has received a yellow card from Rafael Traci.
In the minute 74, At Arena Fonte Nova, Gilberto has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Can Bahia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Recife PE's half?
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
Corner awarded to Bahia.
In the minute 77, The home team replace Nino Paraiba with Saldanha.
Saldanha (Bahia) heads in to reduce the deficit. The score is now 1-2.
In the minute 77, Clayson with an assist there.
Throw-in for Bahia in the half of Recife PE.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
In the minute 79, Clayson gets his shot on target but fails to score for Bahia.
Bahia are coming forward and Elias gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Recife PE at Arena Fonte Nova.
In the minute 80, Rafael Traci signals a Bahia throw-in in Recife PE's half.
Bahia to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
Bahia's Daniel misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 82, It's a goal kick for the away team in Salvador.
Corner awarded to Bahia.
Bahia drives forward and Gregore gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 83, Rafael Traci awards the home team a throw-in.
Bahia are pushing forward but Clayson's finish is wide of the goal.
Rafael Traci awards Recife PE a goal kick.
In the minute 84, Chico is replacing Lucas Mugni for the away team.
Luan Polli for Recife PE has been booked by Rafael Traci and receives a first yellow card.
Bahia's Clayson gets in a shot on goal at Arena Fonte Nova. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 87, In Salvador Bahia drive forward through Daniel. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in high up the field for Bahia in Salvador.
Bahia push forward at Arena Fonte Nova and Gregore gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Recife PE defence.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Bahia close to the penalty box.
In Salvador a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Marcao Silva (Recife PE) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Clayson gets his shot on target but fails to score for Bahia.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Bahia in the half of Recife PE.
At Arena Fonte Nova the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Fessin (Bahia) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Recife PE needs to be cautious. Bahia have an attacking throw-in.
It's 1-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
